entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
